text: Disorder in the Court is an American reality television series that was produced by Meetinghouse Productions and aired on TruTV. ==Synposis== Each episode features brawls and other chaos inside of real court rooms or similar events videotaped elsewhere used as evidence in real court cases. ==Episode list== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="width:100%;" |- ! style="background:#3399FF; color:#000000" | Ep. # ! style="background:#3399FF; color:#000000" | # ! style="background:#3399FF; color:#000000" | Title ! style="background:#3399FF; color:#000000" | Original Airdate |- |} ==External links== * Category:TruTV original programming Category:2000s American reality television series Category:2006 American television series debuts Category:2014 American television series endings
title: Disorder in the Court (TV series)
